attributes.action: Do something about north wales police mans actions
attributes.additional_details: There plenty of evidence that the people have shared on facebook,ie a cctv picture of the motorway at 3 am and it wasn't busy!!
attributes.background: I am petitioning against north wales police on there actions to run over a dog at high speed on the A55. I want action against the officer who did the deed,and the other people who told him too!!!!!

rejection.details:
There is already an investigation into this case. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/news/statement-north-wales-police-referral-a55-dog-death-incident
